title: Low Pt loading with lattice strain for direct ethylene glycol fuel cell
content:

Low Pt loading electrodes are pivotal but challenging in direct ethylene glycol fuel cells (DEGFCs), necessitating a substantial enhancement in both the active site quantity and the catalytic capacity of...
